title: Heal Yourself Naturally: with Turmeric
description: Per National Cancer Institute statistics - an estimate of 1,638,910 men and women will be diagnosed with cancer - and 577,190 men and women will die of cancer in 2012.Obviously, our medical profession has dropped the ball on this one. However, there is one simple herbal spice that could and would change all those statistics.Turmeric curcumin has the antioxidant properties that not only stops cancer in its tracks, but reverses cancer, thus causing the cancer cells to die. It is a natural cure for cancer.If that isn't enough - turmeric's anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties puts an end to the pain of arthritis, inflammatory rheumatism, and Crohn's disease as well as addresses heart problems, Alzheimer's and Parkinson's diseases - and nearly all other body imbalances.Learn about turmeric curcumin as an alternative to health care.
author: Nancy Stine
